Package com.senacor.portal.sc.backend.service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AzureService
    Service for communication with backend systems: FIS, LDAP in Azure for authentication
    BusinessProcessJobTest  
    EmailService
    Service responsible for emailing to the diverse participants about different aspects
    EmployeeOverviewService
    Service for providing overview info of an employee after logging in
    EmployeeOverviewServiceTest
    IT for User info service
    EmployeeService
    Service responsible for handling employees
    FeedbackService
    Service for managing feedback posted by an employee
    FeedbackServiceTest
    IT for Feedback service
    FISDataPatchService
    Service responsible for updating database of employees with CSV file
    FISDataPatchServiceTest  
    FisEmailResolverService
    Service responsible for assigning a company mail to each employee
    FisService
    Service responsible for full communication with FIS
    GetMeService
    Simple service providing information about currently logged user
    GetMeServiceTest
    IT for GetMe Service
    InactiveEmployeeManagementService
    Internal service, used in batch job service to manage employees in the context of their presence in the company This service should not be a part of any REST API
    InactiveEmployeeManagementServiceTest
    IT for InactiveEmployeeManagementService
    InactiveEmployeeService
    Service providing inactive employees and things related to them to the user
    InactiveEmployeeServiceTest
    IT for InactiveEmployeeService
    LogService
    Service for managing official public logs in app
    LogServiceTest  
    MaintenanceService
    Service for managing members of maintenance team
    MaintenanceServiceTest
    IT for MaintenanceService
    PayrollReportService
    Services for managing Payroll Reports
    PayrollReportServiceTest  
    RoleService
    Middle layer for roles management
    RoleServiceTest
    IT for RoleService
    ScDocumentsService
    Service for Excel and PDF exports
    ScDocumentsServiceTest  
    ScOverviewService
    Service for providing overview info about Scorecards
    ScOverviewServiceTest
    Integration test for PrOverviewService (filtering)
    ScService
    ScService is responsible for the whole SC management (request, creation, handling, closing,..)
    ScServiceTest
